definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: See also Lewis and Clark Expedition.
sentences.chinese: 又见刘易斯和克拉克远征。

sentences.english: Last week, the Clarks had lunch at a restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 上周，克拉克一家在餐馆吃的午饭。

sentences.english: I went there to meet Mr ClarksonRoger.
sentences.chinese: 我去那儿见克拉克森先生罗杰。

sentences.english: Mr. Clark is eligible for a fifteen percent discount because he is an employee of the company.
sentences.chinese: 因为克拉克先生是这间公司的员工所以可以打八五折。

sentences.english: It was 4 o'clock when the front doorbell rang. Mrs. Clarke was making tea at the time.
sentences.chinese: 四点的时候门铃响了，这时克拉克太太正在烧茶。

sentences.english: The Clarksons were willing to take her back into their service until she could be admitted there.
sentences.chinese: 克拉克森一家都希望伊莉莎能得到允许重新回来工作。

sentences.english: Clark and Leo have a good time together.
sentences.chinese: 克拉克和里欧相处愉快。

sentences.english: Explain and evaluate J. B. Clark's marginal productivity theory of distribution.
sentences.chinese: 解释和评价克拉克的边际生产力分配理论。

sentences.english: At three o'clock the two detectives drove to the Clarksons' house.
sentences.chinese: 3点钟，两名侦探开车去了克拉克森家。

sentences.english: Either the Clarks or the Kays get being invited.
sentences.chinese: 克拉克全家和凯全家都被邀请了。

sentences.english: Mr Osborne himself reputedly pushed for Mr Clarke's appointment.
sentences.chinese: 据说奥斯本本人曾大力举荐克拉克。

sentences.english: His attorney said he is cooperating with authorities.
sentences.chinese: 克拉克的律师说他将和警方合作。

sentences.english: The gold content of the Archean Taihua Group greenstone belt is lower than Clarke value.
sentences.chinese: 太古宙太华群绿岩带金的丰度低于克拉克值。

sentences.english: Mr. Clark, 24 years old, wasn't arrested, and no charges were filed.
sentences.chinese: 现年24岁的克拉克并未遭到逮捕也没有受到指控。

sentences.english: The two detectives walked back to the Clarksons' house through the garden.
sentences.chinese: 两人穿过花园走回到克拉克森家。

sentences.english: I’ll switch you over to Mr. Clark.
sentences.chinese: 我将您的电话转给克拉克先生。

definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
